pageContext.claim: “We just took over -- you know, you kept hearing it was 90 percent, 92 percent -- the caliphate in Syria. Now it's 100 percent. We just took over. A hundred percent caliphate. That means the area of the land. We just have 100 percent, so that's good.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to have jumped the gun with this claim, as military officials would not confirm it. But while the caliphate is near defeat, there are still thousands of ISIS fighters active in those countries despite their loss of territory.
